name: The Grassy Sea
description:
The Grassy Sea is a a blackpowder expansion & hex crawl for sword-and-whiskers role-playing.

The Grassy Sea swells with wind, 

waxing and waning 

with the seasons. 

But in summertime

when the grass 

grows green and long, 

pirates lurk in the fields, 

ready to plunder.

The Grassy Sea includes a 19-point hex map and full adventure site for The Hollow Tree Gang, as well as the blackpowder rules, weapons, and items. An 8 page supplement ready for your mice to explore.

The Grassy Sea is an independent production by Fey Light Studio and is not affiliated with Losing Games. It is published under the Mausritter Third Party Licence.

Mausritter is copyright Losing Games.

“The Grassy Sea” copyright 2021, Fey Light Studio.
